name: Amino para Furry LGBT
description: Furry LGBT+ Amino es la comunidad de alto crecimiento y plataforma de chat para Furry LGBT+ y aliados. Conoce nuevos amigos, exprsate y comparte tu opinin en una comunidad acogedora y segura.  - CONOCE otras personas Furry LGBT+ y aliados - DISCUTE asuntos y experiencias siendo Furry LGBT+ - COMPARTE tus recursos, opiniones y punto de vista nica - OBTN consejos y apoyo de una comunidad acogedora - APRENDE de y CONTRIBUYE a nuestro catlogo sobre Furry LGBT+ - un recurso til para todas conocer ms sobre la comunidad Furry LGBT+ Furry LGBT + Amino is the community of high growth and chat platform for LGBT + furry and allies. Meet new friends, express yourself and share your opinion in a welcoming and safe community.  - Meet others Furry LGBT + and allies - Discusses issues and experiences being Furry LGBT + - Share your resources, opinions and unique view point - Get tips and support of a welcoming community - Learn from and contribute to our catalog on Furry LGBT + - a useful resource for all learn more about the LGBT community Furry +
